document_data.class2e: City of Splendors describes Shalrin as a 0-th level fighter. Volos Guide to Waterdeep reports his level as 6, attributing the increase to Shalrin becoming an adventurer. Although City of Splendors is a newer source (and set later in the Realms timeline), this article assumes the boxed set is in error, and uses the level reported in Volos Guide.
document_data.mainbody:
Shalrin Meraedos was the Gentleman Keeper of Waterdeeps Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen and the proprietor of Meraedos Fine Furs in the North Ward in the mid&ndash14 century DR.
He always wore a fur half-cloak, under which he concealed a pair of blades.
Shalrin was known as a careful, soft-spoken, and highly observant man.
His favored weapon was a pair of swords of dancing that would fly back to him when called. He was also known to use other magical protection.
As Gentleman Keeper, Shalrin served as the Orders public contact.
According to local rumor, Shalrin had secretly embarked on a lucrative adventuring career in Undermountain. He was reluctant to speak on the matter.
